text.title: Mississippi medical board allows embattled physician to keep license
text.head: Mississippi medical board allows embattled physician to keep license
Sources

list.item: Clay Chandler. "Edwards doctor will keep medical license" — The Clarion-Ledger , April 15, 2015
Jessica Bowman. "89-year-old Edwards doctor gains national media attention" — WLOX , April 14, 2015
